response.overview: From the Ellas son de Mercurio series, performative records by artists who inhabit the magical, occult, spiritual and dream spectrum. The Priestess, First piece in which the Venezuelan painter Anna Herrera takes the duality that this tarot card represents, reflecting the opposite but complementary aspects of reality. The High Priestess acts as a bridge between these two worlds, sitting at the door that leads to a deeper and more spiritual one, to esoteric and mysterious knowledge.
response.title: La sacerdotisa
